text: Kjeld Kirk Kristiansen (; born 27 December 1947) is a Danish businessman. He is the former president and CEO of The Lego Group from 1979 to 2004. According to Forbes, Kristiansen is the third richest Dane, with a net worth of $4.7 billion as of February 2020.The World's Billionaires - Denmark. Forbes.com. Last looked at on February 14th, 2020. He is the grandson of Lego founder Ole Kirk Christiansen. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Danish businesspeople Category:Lego
